Name: Tama
Fate: sunk by USS Jallao northeast of Luzon at 21°23′N 127°19′E﻿ / ﻿21.383°N 127.317°E﻿ / 21.383; 127.317, 25 October 1944
Propulsion:
4 × Gihon geared steam turbines
12 × Kampon boilers
4 × shafts
Armament:
7 × 14 cm/50 3rd Year Type naval guns
2 × 8 cm/40 3rd Year Type naval guns
8 × 533 mm (21.0 in) torpedo tubes
48 × naval mines
Armor:
Belt: 64 mm (3 in)
Deck: 29 mm (1 in)
